Class Program

  • java.lang.Object
    • Program
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MealCreationInterface, OrderCreationInterface

    public class Program
extends java.lang.Object
implements MealCreationInterface, OrderCreationInterface
    Class to handle general operations required by the EYMS system
